channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Begun, the Gerrymandering Wars Have
item.description: Threats have been exchanged, and now we wait until someone pulls the trigger.

item.title: Gavin Newsom, Climate Warrior, Flinches as California’s War Against Oil Produces a Crisis
item.description: He now finds himself pleading with the beleaguered and vilified industry not to abandon the state.

item.title: Trump Should Get His New Census — in 2030
item.description: If he wants it sooner, in statistical terms, it’d be like launching D-Day after a month’s preparation.

item.title: Wrist Slap For Man Who Attacked Pro-Lifers Proves The FACE Act Was Always A Lawfare Tool
item.description: Until Congress passes the FACE Act Repeal Act, pro-lifers are still vulnerable to further abuse -- both legal and physical.

item.title: Israeli Takeover of Gaza Would Be a Big Risk
item.description: Israel’s war against Hamas remains well-justified, but there is a danger of entrenching there.

item.title: Education Dept. Demands Receipts From Universities That Do Affirmative Action Under The Table
item.description: Data collection will allow the federal government to keep tabs on universities trying to hide their racial discrimination.
